message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 80% and you can take 20%
I think a 50/50 split is the fairest way to start.  Let's see if we can make this work!
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still the one taking the risk of proposing. You can do better than this?
Let's compromise.  I'll take 40%, you take 60%. It's a better deal for both of us than the last round, and we avoid the risk of getting nothing at all.
